tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE malware_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_size INT,
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    detection_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE MalwareSamples (
    malware_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    malware_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_size INT,
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareCharacteristics (
    characteristic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    malware_id INT,
    characteristic_name VARCHAR(50),
    characteristic_value VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (malware_id) REFERENCES MalwareSamples(malware_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareSamples (
  sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  file_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  file_type VARCHAR(50),
  file_size INT,
  detection_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareCharacteristics (
  characteristic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  malware_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  behavior_description TEXT,
  os_platform VARCHAR(50),
  sample_id INT REFERENCES MalwareSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_path VARCHAR(255),
    file_size INT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE threat_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES malware_samples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareSamples (
    sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sample_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    file_size INT NOT NULL,
    upload_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareCharacteristics (
    characteristic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    characteristic_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    characteristic_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES MalwareSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ThreatAnalysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    threat_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    analysis_detail TEXT NOT NULL,
    analysis_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES MalwareSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SampleCategories (
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    category_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (sample_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES MalwareSamples(sample_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES MalwareCategories(category_id)
);
